pull.title: ci: Move s390x build to cirrus

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #19179 ([WIP RFC DONOTMERGE] ci: Run ci configs on cirrus by MarcoFalke)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

https://cirrus-ci.com/task/5400693085306880?command=ci#L4756:
```
FAIL: qt/test/test_bitcoin-qt
=============================
Unknown host QEMU_IFLA type: 50
Unknown host QEMU_IFLA type: 51
Unknown host QEMU_IFLA type: 50
Unknown host QEMU_IFLA type: 51
Unknown host QEMU_IFLA type: 50
Unknown host QEMU_IFLA type: 51
Unknown QEMU_IFLA_BR type 46
Unknown QEMU_IFLA_BR type 45
QStandardPaths: XDG_RUNTIME_DIR not set, defaulting to '/tmp/runtime-root'
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::runtime_error'
  what():  locale::facet::_S_create_c_locale name not valid
./qt/test/test_bitcoin-qt: line 2: 116150 Aborted                 (core dumped) qemu-s390x "/tmp/cirrus-ci-build/ci/scratch/build/bitcoin-s390x-linux-gnu/src/qt/test/test_bitcoin-qt_orig" "$@"
FAIL qt/test/test_bitcoin-qt (exit status: 134)
```

> It can detect a bug: https://cirrus-ci.com/task/5693953116733440?command=ci#L4686

However it seems strange.
```
test_bitcoin-qt_orig: chainparams.cpp:113: CMainParams::CMainParams(): Assertion `consensus.hashGenesisBlock == uint256S("0x000000000019d6689c085ae165831e934ff763ae46a2a6c172b3f1b60a8ce26f")' failed.
```
https://cirrus-ci.com/task/5693953116733440?command=ci#L4748
